dmca.title: DMCA / Breach of Copyright
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: World Guides [mailto:info@world-guides.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, August 23, 2006 8:49 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA / Breach of Copyright
Subject: DMCA / Breach of Copyright


Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel,

Unfortunately, your client  http://www.stictravel.com are breaching the
copyright of our site World Guide to Berlin,
http://www.berlin.world-guides.com.

We have contacted them directly on several occasions, but have never
received a response to our correspondence.

Therefore, we issued a DMCA complaint to the webhost Pugmarks,
http://www.pugmarks.net. Pugmarks did reply to our correspondence, but
only to inform us that they could do nothing to help.

As the Registrar for the site http://www.stictravel.com please could you
advise how to proceed with launching a complaint as we wish to file the
DMCA with yourselves as a breach of your Acceptable Use Policy,
http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html.

We greatly appreciate your help in this matter and understand fully that
you do not condone the actions of your client
http://www.stictravel.com.

Thanks once again and we look forward to hearing from you shortly.

Regards,

Martin
WORLD GUIDES

-------------------------

DMCA complaint;

1. MR. MARTIN TREASURE

2.The text copied is as follows:
http://www.stictravel.com/packages/outbound/berlin.asp

3. The original text can be viewed here:
http://www.berlin.world-guides.com

4.  Contact: Martin Treasure - director TravelSmart Ltd
Tel: +44 1373 454064
Email: info@world-guides.com
Address: 18 Wayside Close, Frome, Somerset, England BA11 2DL

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by World Guides.

6. I hereby state under penalty of perjury that this information is
accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the
infringed materials.


Many thanks for your help, please advise if you require any further
information.

I look forward to hearing from you shortly.

MARTIN
